Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can illustrate how sound travels along the string between the two students.
The student can depict that the string is necessary for the sound to travel between the cups.
The student can show how the device allows communication over a distance that is longer than simply speaking without the device.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing that the device specifically uses sound to convey messages.
The student can identify in their drawing the materials used to construct the string telephone (e.g., cups, string).
The student can highlight in their drawing that both students are effectively using the device for communication.
